description:
Hazuki and Hikaru rush unheeding into the arms of the enemy, and Yayoi and Seiji hurry to their aid. Kouhei is at the mercy of the child vampire, as the defender of the mountain watches from the forest.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Big Brother, Where Is This Nursery Rhyme From?
Onii-sama, Sorette Doko no Chihou no Temari Uta?
おにいさま, それってどこの地方の手まり唄?
